article.title: BAE to Provide Identify Friend or Foe Units for Foreign Sales
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: BAE Systems Information and Electronics Systems Integration Inc., Greenlawn, N.Y., is being awarded a $34,278,736 firm-fixed-price contract for 336 AN/APX-125 F-16 Mode 5 Advanced Identify Friend/Foe units. Contract involves foreign military sales. The contracting activity is Air Force Life Cycle Management Center /WWMK, Wright Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio.
